name: Blobs (Fireye)
description:
Blobs was created within 48 hours during the DJAM-5 Game Jam By Second Last Studios.  The Jam's topic was 'Mutation'. Fireye (Coder & Leader) and IndecisiveCatts (Artist) were the main developers of the game. 

How to Play

- WASD + Space to move and jump (arrow keys work too)

- Tab switches controlled blobs (control green -> control purple)

- Purple has mutated the ability to bounce green off of him at high speeds. Pressing Shift while controlling purple will toggle on this ability. Now all green has to do is jump on him.

- Green has mutated larger jump height. With this he can get to platforms that purple can't.

Known issues:

- Too few levels

- Janky controls

- Blobs can hover

- Seemingly random Spaz on purple squish anim

- Green blob clones sometimes appear (purely cosmetic)
